name: Meteor Mayhem (itch) (Alex_D05)
description:
Controls:

Left Mouse Button - Grab Oxygen

Arrow Keys - Control Astronaut

Description:

Quickly patch your ship while beaming in oxygen as you pass through a dangerous asteroid field!

Tips:

-The more damage left unfixed on your ship, the quicker you lose oxygen!
